text:
The LNPs in mRNA COVID-19 vaccines consist of four main components: a neutral phospholipid, cholesterol, a PEG-lipid, and an ionizable cationic lipid. PEG can enhance the stability and lifespan of LNPs.
https://t.co/IkapC040k4
#lipid #nanoparticles #COVID19 #vaccine #mRNA #PEG https://t.co/gENk6FjbjE
